CustomField.description: This field has several options: it can be the expected date a grant is received, the actual date the income hits the account (ALL income including grants), or the date HeartKids expects to hear back about the grant.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field has several options: it can be the expected date a grant is received, the actual date the income hits the account (ALL income including grants), or the date HeartKids expects to hear back about the grant.
